summary: The module provides a command‑line tool that runs the full TLO simulation under profiling, captures execution logs, processes them, and stores the results. It parses user‑specified parameters, records the run configuration to JSON, executes the simulation with the chosen settings, and aggregates performance data for analysis.
business_intent: Enable developers and analysts to evaluate the performance and scalability of the simulation model across different configurations, facilitating optimization and resource planning.
